description: Fundamentals: Primitives, Variables (var, let, const), Timeout & Interval, Operators, Classes
Handling Chrome Dev Tools: Debugging, Running line breaks with breakpoints, Run overrides on the fly, Run snippets, Work with the console, Work with Browser Memories (LS, SS, Cookies)
Modern Syntax ES6: Arrow functions, Template Strings, Ternary Operator, Objects destructuring, Spread Operator, Modules imports, Fetch API

Advanced concepts: How the JS engine works (Chromium V8), Call Stack, Memory Heap, Web API, Callback Queue, Garbage Collector, Closures, Scopes & Hoisting, Prototype, Execution Context, Modules, Synchronous and Asynchronous execution

Framework fundamentals for SPA development: Virtual DOM, JSX, fragments, Class and Functional Components, imports and exports, Hooks (useState, useEffect, useContext), props, proptypes, npm packages installation
Handle the CSS styles with frameworks (Material UI, Chakra UI, Tailwind UI, Bootstrap)
Fundamentals: Content Repository, Foundation Components and Core Components, Editable Templates and Static Templates, Content Authoring, Content Workflow, Digital Asset Management (DAM)
AEM Infrastructure: Pros and Cons of the two ways of deploying AEM, with Standalone Server (integrated Jetty Web Server) and Web Application Deployment (within a third-party application server)

Apache Sling Framework for RESTful Web Applications based on extensible Content Tree like Java Content Repository (JCR). In AEM, Sling uses a JCR to fetch content from the CRX Content Repository and provide that content to the users.
REST Server: HTTP request (GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, PATCH)
Fundamentals: Properties, Id and Class selectors, Layout and positioning, Box Model, Pseudo: selectors & elements, inheritance, overflow, float
Responsive Design: Media Queries, Fluid layouts, Flexbox, Grid Layouts, CSS units, Responsive Images
CSS styles with frameworks (Material UI, Chakra UI, Tailwind UI, Bootstrap)
Fundamentals: DOM Manipulation, Events, jQuery Methods
Fundamentals: DOM Tree, Block and Inline Elements, Anchors and Navigation, Tags & Attributes, Lists, Forms & Input types, imports, images, events, headings, tables
Workers: web worker, service worker, shared worker
